original_title: 縁切り村 〜デッド・エンド・サバイバル〜
overview: Set in a village in the heart of a mountain in Japan. One day, a TV crew from Tokyo, looking to shoot some footage for a show about local cuisine visit a shrine known for being able to sever connections with evil. However, they soon get involved in a plot by the village elder...
title: Enkiri-Mura: Dead End Survival
